aka: 未定名大卫·切斯纪录片

director.name: 亚历克斯·吉布尼 Alex Gibney

this_title: Wise Guy: David Chase and The Sopranos
trans_title: 聪明的家伙：大卫·切斯和黑道家族
未定名大卫·切斯纪录片
introduction: In his CPH:DOX talk, Gibney also revealed he is “just finishing up” another portrait film, about David Chase, creator of The Sopranos. “That’s an unexpected labour of love,” said Gibney. “Why do you think he decided to make The Sopranos? Mommy issues. He wanted to make a movie about his mother [The Sopranos was originally pitched as a feature film], and how crazy she was and how difficult it was growing up with him.
chinese_title: 聪明的家伙：大卫·切斯和黑道家族
foreign_title: Wise Guy: David Chase and The Sopranos
